publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4974 Jamie Hepburn: Whitelees Primary is Scotland’s Best Green School—That the Parliament congratulates Whitelees Primary School, Cumbernauld, on its achievement of the Best Green School Award, sponsored by eaga, at the Scottish Green Awards; believes that this is well-deserved recognition of the dedication of the staff and pupils of the school to environmental and global justice issues; notes the wide range of activities carried out by the school to promote environmentally friendly behaviour both in the classroom and the wider community, and hopes that the award will inspire all schools to continue working towards a greener Scotland and a fairer world. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Rob Gibson*, Aileen Campbell*, Alasdair Allan*, Sandra White*
S3M-4974 Whitelees Primary is Scotland’s Best Green School (lodged on 5 October 2009) Christina McKelvie*, Bill Kidd*, Bill Wilson*, Robin Harper*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-4974 Whitelees Primary is Scotland’s Best Green School (lodged on 5 October 2009) Gil Paterson*
